text: Red Willow County is a county in the U.S. state of Nebraska. As of the 2020 census, 10,702 people lived there. The county seat is McCook. It was founded in 1873. == Geography == The county has a total area of . === Bordering counties === * Furnas County, Nebraska (east) * Decatur County, Kansas (south) * Rawlins County, Kansas (southwest) * Hitchcock County, Nebraska (west) * Frontier County, Nebraska (north) == Communities == * Bartley * Danbury * Indianola * Lebanon * Marion * McCook (county seat) * Perry * Shippee == References == == Other websites == * Category:1873 establishments in Nebraska Category:Nebraska counties
title: Red Willow County, Nebraska
